item.description:
Hi everyone!

To celebrate the upcoming Chinese New Year, I picked "The Islander" as January's restaurant. See their website The Islander for menu, address and directions.

The Islander is well known in Rhode Island for their excellent food and pleasant service. I have beent there several times, and I have to say, their garlic chicken is SUPER garlicy!

I was able to reserve a setup for 18 with individual bills. If the event fills up, please respond as "no" and state that you would like to be put on the wait list. If there are any cancelations, I will contact people in order of RSVP.

I look forward to seeing everyone there!

Here's to good food and stimulating conversation.

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: The Rhode Island Dining Out January Meetup- The Islander
